billing-upgrade-cta-banner.billedTrialEnd: You'll be billed <1>{{billedAmount}}</1> at the end of your trial.
billing-upgrade-cta-banner.completeBilling: Add your billing details now to start your subscription.
billing-upgrade-cta-banner.remainingTrial: You have <1>{{remaining}} remaining</1> on your {{plan}} plan trial.

campaignForm.name: Name
campaignForm.notice1: Campaign content is visible to everyone in your organization.

deleteCampaignModal.boldSubtext: We won't be able to save or analyze any of your campaign data.
deleteCampaignModal.subtext: If you also wish to stop the posts from within this campaign from publishing, please delete each one individually.
deleteCampaignModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete your campaign,

emptyState.imageTag: Example of campaign with multiple posts scheduled.
emptyState.item2: See how they fit together in your schedule.
emptyState.item3: Review campaign performance and hit your goals.
emptyState.subtext: Keep track of multichannel campaigns and create a healthy mix of content on social media.
emptyState.title: Get a clearer picture of your social media strategy
emptyState.locked: Your organization is currently on a plan that no longer supports team members, so these channels are locked and Campaigns are not available. Please contact {{email}} about upgrading the plan.
emptyState.permission: It looks like your organization doesn't have any campaigns yet, and only admin users can create them. Request access from {{email}} or any other Admin.

allPostsSent.subtitle: All the content scheduled for this campaign has been sent.
allPostsSent.title: Woohoo — everything sent!

emptyCampaignBanner.subtext: Eep, this campaign is empty! Create some posts and they’ll be organized here for you to review.
emptyCampaignBanner.title: Let’s build your campaign

emptySentPosts.subtitle: Once your scheduled posts are published, you’ll see them here with some basic post analytics.
emptySentPosts.title: Standing by for sent posts...

viewCampaign.loadingCampaignDetails: Loading campaign details such as date and counters, please hold on
viewCampaign.loadingCampaignName: Loading campaign name, please hold on

close-composer-confirmation-modal.text: Are you sure you want to close the composer? You will lose any unsaved changes.

default-page.defaultTitle: Let's get your account set up!
default-page.permissionSubtitle: It looks like you haven’t been given access to any of your organization’s channels. Request access from {{email}} or any other Admin.

missing-access-page.heading: This organization is missing access to our publishing tools

adminWithOrgAccess.description: Looks like your organization <1>{{orgName}}</1> doesn't have access to our publishing tools quite yet. To add this, sign up below or switch to your other organization <3>{{orgNameWithAccess}}</3> to gain access.

admin.description: Your organization <1>{{orgName}}</1> has yet to sign up for our market leading publishing tools. Find out more or sign up today to get going!

nonAdminWithOrgAccess.description: Your organization <1>{{orgName}}</1> has yet to sign up for our market leading publishing tools, but your other organization <3>{{orgNameWithAccess}}</3> does.

nonAdmin.description: Your organization <1>{{orgName}}</1> doesn't have access to our publishing tools. The administrator <3>{{ownerEmail}}</3> can add this feature. If you can't reach them, for whatever reason, get in touch with us.

instagram-first-comment-modal.body: We’ll walk you through this now – It will just take a moment.
instagram-first-comment-modal.canRequestMorePermission: We'll open up a window for you to grant us that permission now.
instagram-first-comment-modal.headline: It looks like we’ll need permission to post an Instagram comment on your behalf.
instagram-first-comment-modal.postOnYourBehalf: You’ll need to allow Buffer to automatically post Instagram comments on your behalf.
instagram-first-comment-modal.signout: please sign out of your facebook account
instagram-first-comment-modal.userNeedsLogoutSignin: To do this, {signout}, and log into the account which corresponds with {profileName}. Then we can open up a window for you to grant us that permission by clicking continue.

instagram-first-comment-pro-trial-modal.body: Prefer to keep hashtags out of your Instagram captions? Save time by scheduling them as a first comment instead.
instagram-first-comment-pro-trial-modal.heading: Go Pro to include a first comment on scheduled Instagram posts.
instagram-first-comment-pro-trial-modal.heading2: Access all Pro features right now with a free 7-day trial.
instagram-first-comment-pro-trial-modal.imageAlt: Publish your first comment directly to Instagram

proTrialFeatures.firstComment: Schedule first comments on Instagram posts
proTrialFeatures.integrations2: to connect with Zapier, IFTTT, Quuu, Pocket, Feedly, and more.
proTrialFeatures.support: Access fast, helpful email and social media

onboarding-page.testemonial: Publish helps us build a better model of content that generates more engagement.

plans-page.promoDescription: For a limited time, upgrade to the Pro plan and keep your current pricing for 3 months.
plans-page.promoHeader: Get more with the new Buffer Publish

security.title: Security
security.addSecurity: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
security.passwordDescription: Use your password to sign in to Buffer on the web and mobile apps. Make it nice and secure!
security.tfaExplanation: Two factor authentication adds an extra layer of security for your Buffer account. Whenever you log in to your account, after entering your username and password, you will be asked for a second authentication code that was sent to your mobile phone via text or a free mobile app.
security.sendSecutiryCodes: How would you like us to send your security codes?
security.recoveryCodeDescription: With Two Factor Authentication, if you lose your phone there's a possibility you could get locked out of your account. Save this code in a safe place to use if you can't log in with your phone.

notifications.title: Email Notifications
notifications.description: Get email alerts and updates to help you manage your Buffer account.
notifications.collaborationEmail: Send me emails about contributions from team members. For example, if a post is awaiting approval.
notifications.newsletterEmail: Send me emails with product updates, tips, and best practices.
notifications.queueEmail: Send me emails about changes to the status of my queue and scheduled posts. For example, when a post successfully publishes or if my queue becomes empty.
notifications.postFailureEmail: Send me an email if a post in my queue fails to be published.
notifications.celebrationsEmail: Send me emails celebrating my social media achievements with Buffer.

appsAndExtras.title: Buffer Apps & Extras
appsAndExtras.description: Get the most out of Buffer with our mobile apps and browser extension.
appsAndExtras.extensionDescription: Our browser extension lets you share content as you browse the web.
appsAndExtras.mobileAppsDescription: Share content and manage your Buffer account on the go with our mobile apps.
appsAndExtras.connectedAppsDesc: Get the most out of Buffer and share from your mobile, news reader, blog or anywhere!

profile-sidebar.permissionSubtitle: It looks like you haven’t been given permission to add/manage channels. Request access from {{email}} or any other Admin.

profiles-disconnected-banner.body: Please make sure that you're logged into this account on the same network, and we'll get you back in business in no time!
profiles-disconnected-banner.permissionBody: Reach out to {{email}} or any other Admin.

extraMessage.instagram: Due to recent changes to the Instagram API, your personal Instagram account will need to be reconnected.

profiles-disconnected-banner.headline: Uh-oh, we've lost access to this channel! Let's reconnect.

profiles-disconnected-modal.body1: We’ve lost access to the following channels, in order for us to resume posting to these channels you will need to reconnect them.
profiles-disconnected-modal.body2: Note: You’ll need to be logged in to the correct account on the network to successfully reconnect a channel.

extraMessage.instagram: Due to recent changes to the Instagram API, your personal Instagram accounts will need to be reconnected.

profiles-disconnected-modal.headline: We’ve lost access to some of your channels

steal-profile-modal.body1: Each channel can be tied to one Buffer account for security reasons. This Buffer account may be under a different email address that belongs to your organisation.
steal-profile-modal.body4: Buffer account, it needs to be removed from the other account first.
steal-profile-modal.headline2: is already connected to another Buffer account.
steal-profile-modal.notSureWhere: Not sure where your channel has been added already?

story-group-composer.noteSubText: When it comes time to post, you'll be able to copy and paste your note into Instagram.

story-group-queue.mobileTagText: Uh-oh! Looks like you might not have the latest version of the Buffer mobile app. Download it now to start using Stories!
story-group-queue.reminderText1: When it’s time to post your Story, we’ll send a

start.setReminders: Set Up Reminders to Get Started
start.step1Description: Due to Instagram limitations, Stories can't be directly scheduled. A Reminder is a notification from the Buffer Publish app.
start.step2Description: Storyboard your content and create draft captions. Then, choose the date and time you'd like to share with your audience.
start.step3Description: When your scheduled time arrives, Buffer will send you a Reminder. Preview on mobile, then tap to open in Instagram.
start.title: Get Started with Instagram Stories

story-preview.noteExplanation: When it comes time to post, you'll be able to copy and paste your note into Instagram.
story-preview.notePlaceholder: Add your caption or a note-to-self

upload-zone.invalidFileSize: We can't upload "{fileName}" because it's too large: we can only handle files of that type up to {formattedMaxSize}. Could you try a smaller file?
upload-zone.invalidFormatCantOneOfFiles: We can't quite use some of the selected types of files. Could you try one of the following instead: {acceptedFilesText}
upload-zone.invalidFormatCantSingleFile: We can't quite use that type of file. Could you try one of the following instead: {acceptedFilesText}?
upload-zone.invalidFormatCantUseAnyFiles: We can't quite use any of the selected types of files. Could you try one of the following instead: {acceptedFilesText}
upload-zone.invalidFormatCantUseSomeFiles: We can't quite use some of the selected types of files. Could you try one of the following instead: {acceptedFilesText}
